long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
uVPN - The best free Chrome VPN extension to hide your IP,access blocked content online from the moment you connect to our VPN servers,and unblock websites, streaming content, and more.  

uVPN browser extension uses strong encryption to secure all your traffic and hides your real IP address so you can access any blocked website, protect your data and surf the internet anonymously without a data limit.

Features of uvpn：

* Do not save any logs，Total Security

* Complete Freedom，You can access any service you need

* Fastest VPN browser extension

* Unblock streaming sites

* Absolute Anonymity

* Hide my IP

* Easy Set-up

* No credit card, free service(We will provide premium service fee service soon)
